title: Installation issue: openmpi@1.10.2 %gcc@4.8.5
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openmpi@1.10.2%gcc@4.8.5
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j20'

14 errors found in build log:

             vt/extlib/otf/configure  '--with-openmpi-inside=1.7' '--prefix=/opt/software/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc/4.8.5/openmpi/1.10.2-hdum7dzm7l
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
# uname -a
Linux login 3.10.0-957.5.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Feb 1 14:54:57 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
# cat /etc/centos-release
CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core) 
``` 
and, if relevant, post or attach:

- `packages.yaml`


to the issue

### Additional information
The error seems related to certain versions of libs missing in CentOS 7.6

First of all, you can post the full output of:
```console
$ spack spec --install-status <spec>
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   openmpi@1.10.2%gcc@4.8.5

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   openmpi@1.10.2%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2" ~cuda+cxx_exceptions fabrics=verbs ~java~legacylaunchers~memchecker~pmi schedulers=auto ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]      ^hwloc@1.11.11%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2" ~cairo~cuda~gl+libxml2~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]          ^libpciaccess@0.14%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2"  arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]          ^libxml2@2.9.8%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2" ~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]              ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2"  arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]              ^pkgconf@0.27.1%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2"  arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]              ^xz@5.2.2%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2"  arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]              ^zlib@1.2.7%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2" +optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
[+]          ^numactl@2.0.9%gcc@4.8.5 cflags="-O2" cxxflags="-O2" fflags="-O2"  arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
